Subject: VIP Client Dinner in KSA - Insurance Required
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop, 

Hope all is well. 

We have an event happening at a client's house on February 11th in KSA and we will need your assistance in creating an insurance for the items in the list attached. Ideally the insurance should cover the items from the 10th of February to 12 of February to ensure their safety. 

Thank you!

Nesma Shahin.
